newsitem.title: USA: Eastman Kodak completes Wang unit purchase.
newsitem.headline: Eastman Kodak completes Wang unit purchase.

text.p: Eastman Kodak Co said Monday it had completed the purchase of Wang Laboratories Inc's software business unit in a cash deal worth $260 million.
Under its new name Eastman Software Inc, the unit will work alongside the company's Business Imaging Systems organization, it said.
Kodak reached a definitive agreement to acquire the unit in January.
It said the technical and marketing alliance Wang Software established with Microsoft Corp will be transferred to Eastman Software.

As part of the alliance, Wang Software's imaging viewer was incorporated as a standard accessory in Microsoft's Windows 95 and Windows NT software, it said. Also included in the transaction is a preferred vendor status with Microsoft for imaging and workflow software, along with the joint marketing activities promoting that relationship, and a joint development relationship for next generation storage management software, it said.
